name: Mondrian Forever
description:
Help Bucky make some paintings! Move with the arrows or WASD. Click on the buckets on the top-left (or use the hotkeys 1 and 2) to collect the colour of the tile you are on, or empty the bucket in a white tile.
Put the colours where the splashes tell you to finish the levels! Being in a yellow tile makes you jump higher, you can swim in blue tiles, and can't jump at all in red tiles.

Challenges completed (5 out of 8):

  •  Make all your own sound effects using only sounds you can make with your mouth. Onomatopoeia recommended.
  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.

Made By: Avantir Yihn, Morgân von Brylân
Music: Tyttuut – Snyfs by SYRSA
